document.full_text: pakistani security officials have detained a former navy commando and his brother in connection with last week's militant attack on a naval air base, intelligence officials and relatives said on monday.
document.title: ex-navy commando, brother detained after pakistan base attack
lines_and_colors: pakistani security officials have detained a former navy commando and his brother in connection with last week's militant attack on a naval air base, intelligence officials and relatives said on monday.
